law.history: Repealed 1978 Ky. Acts ch. 155, sec. 165, effective June 17, 1978; amended 1978 Ky. Acts ch. 17, sec. 1. -- Amended 1952 Ky. Acts ch. 41, sec. 3. -- Recodified 1942 Ky. Acts ch. 208, sec. 1, effective October 1, 1942, from Ky. Stat. secs. 4384-5, 4384-7, 4384-15, 4384-32.

metadata.catchline-at-repeal: Superintendent is executive officer of State Board of Education -- General duties.
metadata.lrc-note: This section was also amended by Acts 1978, ch. 17, Â§ 1, approved March 3, 1978. The later repeal by Acts 1978, ch. 155, Â§ 165, approved March 29, 1978, however, prevails.
